0.text: Innate: Gwen's basic attacks  on-hit, the center of  Snip Snip!, and  Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
0.html: Innate: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit, the center of Snip Snip!, and Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
markedPassages: on-hit
Snip Snip!
Needlework
1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

1.text:
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:
 Heals Gwen for 50% of post-mitigation damage dealt against  champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance.
Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against  minions that are below 40% health.
Deals a maximum of 6 (+ 10% AP) magic damage against  monsters.
1.html:
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:

  • Heals Gwen for 50% of post-mitigation damage dealt against champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance.
  • Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against minions that are below 40% health.
  • Deals a maximum of 6 (+ 10% AP) magic damage against monsters.
markedPassages: Heals
champions
8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage
minions
monsters

0.text: Passive: Gwen's basic attacks generate a stack of Snippy on-hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks.
0.html: Passive: Gwen's basic attacks generate a stack of Snippy on-hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks.

1.text: Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip applies  Thousand Cuts and converts 50% of the damage to   true damage instead. Snip Snip! deals 75% damage against  minions, and  executes them on the first damage instance if they are below 20% health.
1.html: Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip applies Thousand Cuts and converts 50% of the damage to  true damage instead. Snip Snip! deals 75% damage against minions, and executes them on the first damage instance if they are below 20% health.

0.text: Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 4 seconds. Hallowed Mist can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.
0.html: Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 4 seconds. Hallowed Mist can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.

1.text: While inside the mist, Gwen gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is  untargetable to all enemies (except  turrets and  monsters) outside of the mist.
1.html: While inside the mist, Gwen gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is untargetable to all enemies (except turrets and monsters) outside of the mist.
markedPassages: bonus armor
bonus magic resistance
untargetable
turrets
monsters

2.text: Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.
2.html: Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.

3.text: Gwen negates all attacks by  monsters outside of the mist.
3.html: Gwen negates all attacks by monsters outside of the mist.
markedPassages: monsters
possibleConcerningAbilities: Gwen negates all attacks by  monsters outside of the mist.

0.text: Active: Gwen  dashes to the target location, then empowers her basic attacks within the next 4 seconds to deal 15 (+ 20% AP) bonus magic damage  on-hit and gain  bonus attack speed and  75 bonus attack range.

on-hit
bonus attack speed

1.text: Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds a portion of Skip 'n Slash's  cooldown.
1.html: Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds a portion of Skip 'n Slash's  cooldown.
markedPassages: cooldown

2.text: Skip 'n Slash  resets Gwen's basic attack timer, and can be cast during any of her abilities, and vice versa. Skip 'n Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Skip 'n Slash resets Gwen's basic attack timer, and can be cast during any of her abilities, and vice versa. Skip 'n Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

1.text: Needlework can be recast twice more within 6 seconds of the activation at no additional cost, with a 1-second static cooldown between casts. Each subsequent cast refreshes the duration and increases the number of needles launched by 2. Needle hits beyond the first  slow by a reduced amount against each individual target.
1.html: Needlework can be recast twice more within 6 seconds of the activation at no additional cost, with a 1-second static cooldown between casts. Each subsequent cast refreshes the duration and increases the number of needles launched by 2. Needle hits beyond the first slow by a reduced amount against each individual target.
markedPassages: slow

2.text: Recast: Gwen mimics the first cast's effects, while launching three needles on the second cast and five on the third cast.

textContent.text:
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:
 Heals Gwen for 50% of post-mitigation damage dealt against  champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance.
Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against  minions that are below 40% health.
Deals a maximum of 6 (+ 10% AP) magic damage against  monsters.
textContent.html:
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:

  • Heals Gwen for 50% of post-mitigation damage dealt against champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance.
  • Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against minions that are below 40% health.
  • Deals a maximum of 6 (+ 10% AP) magic damage against monsters.

textContent.text: Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds a portion of Skip 'n Slash's  cooldown.
textContent.html: Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds a portion of Skip 'n Slash's  cooldown.

skillTabs.concerningText: Gwen's first basic attack within the duration refunds a portion of Skip 'n Slash's  cooldown.

textContent.text: Skip 'n Slash  resets Gwen's basic attack timer, and can be cast during any of her abilities, and vice versa. Skip 'n Slash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

textContent.text: Active: Gwen launches a needle in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them for 1.5 seconds.
textContent.html: Active: Gwen launches a needle in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them for 1.5 seconds.

skillTabs.concerningText: Active: Gwen launches a needle in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them for 1.5 seconds.

markedPassages: (+ 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health)

textContent.text: Needlework can be recast twice more within 6 seconds of the activation at no additional cost, with a 1-second static cooldown between casts. Each subsequent cast refreshes the duration and increases the number of needles launched by 2. Needle hits beyond the first  slow by a reduced amount against each individual target.

Each subsequent cast refreshes the duration and increases the number of needles launched by 2. Needle hits beyond the first slow by a reduced amount against each individual target.

Each subsequent cast refreshes the duration and increases the number of needles launched by 2. Needle hits beyond the first  slow by a reduced amount against each individual target.

textContent.text: Recast: Gwen mimics the first cast's effects, while launching three needles on the second cast and five on the third cast.

textContent.text: Innate: Gwen's basic attacks  on-hit, the center of  Snip Snip!, and  Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
textContent.html: Innate: Gwen's basic attacks on-hit, the center of Snip Snip!, and Needlework deal bonus magic damage equal to 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health.
markedPassages: 1% (+ 0.8% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health

textContent.text:
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:
 Heals Gwen for 50% of post-mitigation damage dealt against  champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance.
Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against  minions that are below 40% health.
Deals a maximum of 6 (+ 10% AP) magic damage against  monsters.
textContent.html:
Thousand Cuts is modified based on the target:

  • Heals Gwen for 50% of post-mitigation damage dealt against champions, capped at 10 − 25 (based on level) (+ 6.5% AP) per instance.
  • Deals an additional 8 − 30 (based on level) bonus magic damage against minions that are below 40% health.
  • Deals a maximum of 6 (+ 10% AP) magic damage against monsters.

textContent.text: Passive: Gwen's basic attacks generate a stack of Snippy on-hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks.
textContent.html: Passive: Gwen's basic attacks generate a stack of Snippy on-hit for 6 seconds, stacking up to 4 times and refreshing on subsequent attacks.

textContent.text: Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip applies  Thousand Cuts and converts 50% of the damage to   true damage instead. Snip Snip! deals 75% damage against  minions, and  executes them on the first damage instance if they are below 20% health.
textContent.html: Active: Gwen snips at least twice with her scissors in a cone in the target direction over the cast time, dealing magic damage per snip to all enemies within the area, with the final snip dealing increased damage. The center of each snip applies Thousand Cuts and converts 50% of the damage to  true damage instead. Snip Snip! deals 75% damage against minions, and executes them on the first damage instance if they are below 20% health.

textContent.text: Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 4 seconds. Hallowed Mist can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.
textContent.html: Active: Gwen summons the Hallowed Mist upon her current location, lasting for 4 seconds. Hallowed Mist can be recast after 0.5 seconds, and does so automatically if Gwen attempts to leave the area.

textContent.text: While inside the mist, Gwen gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is  untargetable to all enemies (except  turrets and  monsters) outside of the mist.
textContent.html: While inside the mist, Gwen gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is untargetable to all enemies (except turrets and monsters) outside of the mist.

skillTabs.concerningText: While inside the mist, Gwen gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance and is  untargetable to all enemies (except  turrets and  monsters) outside of the mist.

textContent.text: Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.
textContent.html: Recast: Gwen commands the mist to move to her current location.

textContent.text: Gwen negates all attacks by  monsters outside of the mist.
textContent.html: Gwen negates all attacks by monsters outside of the mist.
